about_the_game:
In this game, you play as Ronnie, a delivery man working for a tea diner, who has a crush on a girl customer.
Day after day, you and the girl are getting to know each other better. Just when you think you may get lucky this time in love, the girl goes missing. You are devastated by her disappearance and determined to find out what has happened to her. But can you handle the truth? Do you really want to know the truth?

Game feature:
-An appealing story based on a HK urban legend.
-Authentic scenes resembling HK.
-Original and gripping puzzles.
-This game grants you a whole new gaming experience in a horror game.

Dubbed in Cantonese:
-Every scene and line in the game is dubbed in Cantonese, which enables the players to virtually explore Hong Kong.

Various side stories and endings:
-In the game, every decision you make will result in different development and endings. There are many achievements in the game to make it even more challenging. Come play and seek out the truth. Will you be able to escape the reincarnation from love, or for love?

name: UrbanLegend Hong Kong: Takeaway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: In this game, you play as Ronnie, a delivery man working for a tea diner, who has a crush on a girl customer.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
